title: Just created the smartest ranked team name
body:
The name of the team is "Delta Eye Gaming"

Delta in physics has the symbol Δ
So our logo would be the illuminati symbol, because Δ + {{item:2050}} .

The team tag would also be DEG, which stands for degrees on a scientific calculator :>

If you wanna join just add me in game and give me a message, i'm silver 1.

replies.body: I lost brain cells reading this.
Don't take stuff seriously. I've tried it, it doesn't work.
it was meant to be a joke
Why does everyone put gaming at the end of the team name, you aren't a corporation or anything that does things other than gaming. I just don't understand it.
it's a fucking joke mate get over it
Kinda referring to the fact every team I see now has gaming at the end of it, calm your tits.
I sent you a request add me if you're looking for a top, jg or mid : )
hahah fkn genius, i'm only Bronze 3 but would be keen as to join a sick team like this. I can play top or jg good or can just fill with any champ
